mapper.select: SELECT report_id as reportId, report_op_id as reportOpId, chat_id as chatId, date as date, reported_user_id as reportedUserId, user_id as userId, status as status, tx_id as txId, tx_host as txHost, tx_user as txUserId, tx_date as txDate, tx_update as txUpdate FROM report WHERE report_id = #{reportId} and status=1

SELECT DISTINCT b.report_id as reportId, d.name as reportedUser, k.name as user, b.date as dateChat, ro.description as reportOp FROM message a, report b, user d, report_options ro, user k WHERE b.reported_user_id = d.user_id AND b.user_id = k.user_id AND ro.report_op_id = b.report_op_id AND b.status = 1 GROUP BY d.name ASC
